price: 39. Allah abolit[253] ou maintient ce qu’Il veut. Il détient l’Écriture matricielle.
arabic: يَمۡحُواْ ٱللَّهُ مَا يَشَآءُ وَيُثۡبِتُۖ وَعِندَهُۥٓ أُمُّ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: yamḥū al-lahu mā yashāu wayuth'bitu waʿindahu ummu al-kitābi
